byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Milan Schreuer and James Kanter from Brussels; Aurelien Breeden from Paris; and Sewell Chan from London.

abstract: Fear of terrorist attack by Islamic State paralyzes Brussels for third day as eerie silence envelops Belgian capital; authorities say state of high alert will stay in place for all of Belgium for several days, though some restrictions will be lifted.
lead_paragraph: The city remained jittery after a number of false alarms involving hotels and even City Hall, which was closed on Monday.

headline.main: For Third Day, Brussels Is Paralyzed by Terror Dragnet
headline.print_headline: For Third Day, Terror Menace Saps Brussels

snippet: The city remained jittery after a number of false alarms involving hotels and even City Hall, which was closed on Monday.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
